post.description: Executes a defined MCMP API action with parameters structured in McmpApiCallRequest.
post.summary: Call an external MCMP API action (Structured Request)

200.description: External API Response (structure depends on the called API)

400.description: error: Invalid request body or parameters

404.description: error: Service or action not found

500.description: error: Internal server error or failed to call external API

put.description: Updates specific fields (e.g., BaseURL, Auth info) of an MCMP API service definition identified by its name. Cannot update name or version.

200.description: message: Service updated successfully" // Or return updated service?

400.description: error: Invalid service name or request body

put.description: Sets the specified version of an MCMP API service as the active one.
put.summary: Set Active Version for a Service

400.description: error: Invalid service name or version

404.description: error: Service or version not found

500.description: error: Failed to set active version

post.description: List menus mapped to a specific platform role.
post.summary: List menus mapped to platform role

post.description: Register or update menus from a local YAML file specified by the filePath query parameter, or from the MCWEBCONSOLE_MENUYAML URL in .env if not provided. If loaded from URL, the file is saved to asset/menu/menu.yaml.
post.summary: Register/Update menus from YAML file or URL

parameters.description: YAML file path (optional, uses .env URL or default local path if not provided)
parameters.name: filePath

200.description: message: Successfully registered menus from YAML

post.description: Parse YAML text in the request body and register or update menus in the database. Recommended Content-Type: text/plain, text/yaml, application/yaml.
post.summary: Register/Update menus from YAML in request body

parameters.example:
"menus:
  - id: new-item
    parentid: dashboard
    displayname: New Menu Item
    restype: menu
    isaction: false
    priority: 10
    menunumber: 9999"
parameters.description: Menu definitions in YAML format (must contain 'menus:' root key)
parameters.name: yaml

200.description: message: Successfully registered menus from request body

400.description: error: 잘못된 요청 본문 또는 YAML 형식 오류

cspRoleName.description: csp의 RoleName. 여러 role이 있기때문에 csp에 정의한 role로 구분하기 위해 사용

requestParams.description: Parameters for the external API call

body.description: Request body (accept any JSON structure) - Changed from json.RawMessage for swag compatibility

pathParams.description: Parameters to replace in the resource path (e.g., {userId})

queryParams.description: Parameters to append as query string (?key=value)

children.description: Slice of pointers to child nodes

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
